search.title: Search
search.placeholder: Search for people, posts, or hashtags (press Enter to search)
search.emptyHistory: Search for people, posts, or hashtags
search.tryDifferent: Try searching with a different name
search.enterToStart: Enter a name or username to start a conversation

account.hiddenProfile: This profile has been hidden by the moderators of {domain}.
account.follow_hint: Follow some people to see their posts here.
account.end_of_timeline: You've reached the end of your timeline

followingPage.title: Following
followingPage.hiddenInfo: This user has chosen to not make this information available

followersPage.title: Followers
followersPage.hiddenInfo: This user has chosen to not make this information available

category.title: Tell us what's going on with this {type}

dislike.label: I don't like it
dislike.description: It is not something you want to see

spam.label: It's spam
spam.description: Malicious links, fake engagement, or repetitive replies

legal.label: It's illegal
legal.description: You believe it violates the law of your or the server's country

violation.label: It violates server rules
violation.description: You are aware that it breaks specific rules

other.label: It's something else
other.description: The issue does not fit into other categories

statuses.title: Is there anything else you want to add?
statuses.description: You can include more posts from this account if you'd like
statuses.included: The post you selected has been included in your report.
statuses.optional: You can select specific posts to include in your report if relevant.

comment.title: Anything else we should know?
comment.description: Add any additional comments that might help us understand the situation

description.dislike: While we won't take action on this specific report, you have options to reduce what you see from this account.
description.other: Your report has been submitted. We'll look into this and take appropriate action if needed.

suggestions.block: Block the account to hide their content

deletePost.title: Delete post?
deletePost.message: This action cannot be undone. Your post will be permanently deleted from your profile and the timelines of your followers.

profileEditor.title: Edit profile
profileEditor.extraFieldsDescription: You can have up to 4 items displayed as a table on your profile

linkVerification.title: Link verification
linkVerification.description: You can verify yourself as the owner of the links in your profile metadata. For this, the linked website must contain a link back to your Mastodon profile. The link back must have a <code /> attribute.
linkVerification.copyTip: Tip: The link on your website can be invisible. The important part is which prevents impersonation.

timeline.title: Home
timeline.subtitle: Your personal timeline
timeline.newPosts: {count, plural, =1 {# New Post} other {# New Posts}}

profile.hiddenInfo: This user has chosen to not make this information available

composer.visibilityDescription: Control who can interact with this post. You can also apply settings to all future posts by navigating to Preferences > Posting defaults.
composer.quoteDisabled: Follower-only posts authored on Mastodon can't be quoted by others.
composer.scheduleHelp: Post will be published automatically at this time.

options.quoteFollowersDesc: Only your followers can quote this post

visibilityOptions.unlistedDesc: Do not show in public timelines

upload.altTextDescription: Describe this media for visually impaired users...

saveDraft.title: Save this post as a draft?
saveDraft.message: If you discard now, you'll lose this post.

discardChanges.title: Discard changes?
discardChanges.message: Are you sure you want to discard your changes? This cannot be undone.

explore.title: Explore
explore.noTrendingPosts: No trending posts at the moment
explore.noTrendingTags: No trending tags at the moment
explore.noTrendingNews: No trending news at the moment
explore.reachedEndPosts: You've reached the end of trending posts
explore.reachedEndTags: You've reached the end of trending tags
explore.reachedEndNews: You've reached the end of trending news

conversation.title: Conversation
conversation.deleteConfirmFull: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? This cannot be undone.
conversation.deleteError: Failed to delete conversation. Please try again.

conversations.title: Direct Messages
conversations.sendDirect: Send a direct message to start a conversation
conversations.failedLoadDesc: Failed to load your direct messages. Please try again later.

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.endOfList: You've reached the end of your notifications

empty.allDesc: When someone interacts with your posts, you'll see it here.
empty.mentionsDesc: When someone mentions you, you'll see it here.

types.reblog: {count, plural, =1 {<link>{name}</link> boosted your post} other {<link>{name}</link> and {remainingCount} others boosted your post}}
types.follow: {count, plural, =1 {<link>{name}</link> followed you} other {<link>{name}</link> and {remainingCount} others followed you}}
types.follow_request: {count, plural, =1 {<link>{name}</link> requested to follow you} other {<link>{name}</link> and {remainingCount} others requested to follow you}}
types.favourite: {count, plural, =1 {<link>{name}</link> favourited your post} other {<link>{name}</link> and {remainingCount} others favourited your post}}
types.poll: A poll you voted in has ended
types.update: A post you boosted was edited
types.quote: {count, plural, =1 {<link>{name}</link> quoted your post} other {<link>{name}</link> and {remainingCount} others quoted your post}}
types.quoted_update: A post you quoted was edited
types.admin_sign_up: {count, plural, =1 {<link>{name}</link> signed up} other {<link>{name}</link> and {remainingCount} others signed up}}
types.severed_relationships: Some of your follow relationships have been severed
types.moderation_warning: A moderator has taken action against your account

lists.title: Lists
lists.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete "{title}"? This action cannot be undone.
lists.description: Lists let you organize the accounts you follow into curated timelines.
lists.exclusiveDesc: Posts from list members won't appear in your home timeline

empty.noTrendingPosts: No trending posts at the moment
empty.noTrendingTags: No trending tags at the moment
empty.noTrendingNews: No trending news at the moment

settings.title: Settings
settings.interfaceLanguageDesc: Change the language of the application interface

pushNotifications.title: Push notifications
pushNotifications.description: Configure push notification settings for your device.
pushNotifications.enabled: Enabled - receive notifications even when the app is closed
pushNotifications.disabled: Receive notifications even when the app is closed
pushNotifications.permissionDenied: Permission denied. Enable notifications in your browser settings.

preferencesPage.postingDefaultsDesc: Configure default settings for new posts
preferencesPage.quoteDisabled: Follower-only and private posts can't be quoted by others.
preferencesPage.markSensitive: Mark media as sensitive by default
preferencesPage.markSensitiveDesc: Hide media attachments behind a content warning
preferencesPage.privacyDesc: Control your profile visibility and discoverability
preferencesPage.botAccountDesc: This account mainly performs automated actions
preferencesPage.hideCollectionsDesc: Hide your followers and who you follow from your profile
preferencesPage.indexable: Include public posts in search results
preferencesPage.indexableDesc: Allow your public posts to be discoverable through search
preferencesPage.discoverableDesc: Allow your account to be discovered
preferencesPage.showScrollToTopDesc: Show a button to quickly scroll back to the top of the timeline

options.unlistedDesc: Hidden from search results, viral timelines

filtersPage.title: Filters
filtersPage.empty: You haven't created any filters yet.
filtersPage.emptyDesc: Filters allow you to hide or blur posts containing specific words or phrases.
filtersPage.failedLoad: Failed to load filters. Please try again.
filtersPage.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete the filter "{title}"?

mutesPage.title: Muted Accounts
mutesPage.emptyDesc: When you mute someone, their posts and notifications will be hidden from you.

blocksPage.title: Blocked Accounts
blocksPage.emptyDesc: When you block someone, they won't be able to see your posts or interact with you.

logoutConfirm.title: Log out?
logoutConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to log out?

statusDetail.title: Post
statusDetail.failedLoadDesc: This post could not be found or loaded.

scheduled.title: Scheduled Posts
scheduled.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel this scheduled post?

empty.title: No scheduled posts
empty.description: Posts you schedule will appear here.
